snippet: Leslie Moonves has steered the broadcaster to the top of the ratings charts and is known for his creative talent.
abstract: CBS Corp renews its contract with chief exec Leslie Moonves for two more years, through 2019.
lead_paragraph: Leslie Moonves has steered the broadcaster to the top of the ratings charts and is known for his creative talent.

headline.main: CBS Thanks Leslie Moonves by Extending His Contract Two More Years
headline.print_headline: CBS Thanks Successful Chief by Extending His Contract Two More Years
